body.p: The IBM BAMOE Source Files Add-on adds the capability of listing and downloading source files to IBM BAMOE projects.

lq.p: ⚠️ This add-on isn’t supposed to be used by end-users, if not needed for internal integrations, since it can be a potential security breach for some users' use cases.

body.p: To add the endpoints to download your services' source files, you can add the source files add-on as a dependency in your pom.xml file.

body.p: You can also disable plain-text passwords by setting the quarkus.security.users.embedded.plain-text property to false or just removing it from the configuration. In this case, the passwords are encrypted using MD5.
